attributes.action: Make Gas, Electricity suppliers use a single unit at all times and supply costs per unit and no hidden charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make domestic suppliers of gas and electricity to homes in the UK use a single unit and show the price per unit openly. So to allow easy comparison between companies and charges. Not the sliding scale unit charges they use now and to also have NO hidden charges.
